red.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The id of the float [Output Component](https://esphome.io/components/output/index.html#output) to use for the red channel.

*See also: [RGB Light](https://esphome.io/components/light/rgb.html#configuration-variables)*

green.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The id of the float [Output Component](https://esphome.io/components/output/index.html#output) to use for the green channel.

*See also: [RGB Light](https://esphome.io/components/light/rgb.html#configuration-variables)*

blue.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The id of the float [Output Component](https://esphome.io/components/output/index.html#output) to use for the blue channel.

*See also: [RGB Light](https://esphome.io/components/light/rgb.html#configuration-variables)*

effects.docs:
**list**: A list of [light effects](https://esphome.io/components/light/index.html#light-effects) to use for this light.

*See also: [RGB Light](https://esphome.io/components/light/rgb.html#configuration-variables)*
